ygData.subject: RE: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, my run thru Kith was in day time hours.  What is in Kith for 30+?  I thought the Invasion was a one time thing for the PoH debut. As for faster than
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, my run thru Kith was in day time hours. What is in Kith for 30+? I
thought the Invasion was a one time thing for the PoH debut.

As for faster than anything in Norrath, have you raced Grimfeather lately?
Granted he's not in Kith but he's faster than my MM drums. Also, Shadowmen
are faster as well - I have heard.

What fun is it if you are not scared? (The whole game I mean.)

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Kyle Q [mailto:kyleq@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 10:02 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kith Nerfed!!! Re: Undead
drops in Kithicor

From: "Kyle Q" <kyleq@...>

Kithicor scary?? Errr.....I always thought Kith was pretty
damn boring. As
for scary, who is scared when you are running faster than
anything else in
Norrath can.

Kith rocks now. Great outdoor zone for lvl 30+. It's about
time.
